suggestions.original: To improve the picture organization, consider refining the overlapping shapes and colors to create a clearer separation between elements. This can help enhance the flow and reduce any visual clutter. Additionally, you might experiment with varying the sizes and positions of the abstract shapes to create a more balanced composition. Ensuring that the central elements, such as the colorful dragon and the children, remain the focal points will help maintain the viewer's engagement.
